title: Hi
body: Did you need something from me? #line:10000200

title: Pet
body: Did you bring your pet with you today? #line:10000400

title: Animals
body: Don't forget to take good care of your animals. #line:10000700
It would be bad if something happened to them... #line:10000800

title: Tool
body: Hey, ah... you know, you can charge lots of tools to make them work better. #line:10001000
Like ^c:d03e37;hammers^c:pop; or ^c:d03e37;shovels^c:pop; will break larger areas. #line:10001100
^c:d03e37;Hoes^c:pop; can plough a whole field in one go. #line:10001200

title: FeedPet
body: Y... you're feeding your pet regularly right? #line:10001600
If you don't... it won't be very happy. #line:10001700
That would be a bit sad don't you think? #line:10001800

title: Stare
body: Could you... could you not stare at me quite that much? #line:10002000
It's making me feel a bit nervous... #line:10002100

title: Visit
body: Can... can I visit your farm every now and again? #line:10002200
I'd like to play with some of the animals. #line:10002300

title: Cats
body: I've heard of places that have large numbers of stray cats... #line:10002500
Wouldn't it be nice if was like that around here? #line:10002600
I feel... more comfortable around cats I think... #line:10002700

title: Forest
body: Have you spent much time in the woodlands around here? #line:10002900
I really... really love the peace and quiet they offer. #line:10003000

title: Crate
body: If you want to move animals around... #line:10003200
You can make ^c:d03e37;capture crates^c:pop; to pick them up. #line:10003300
There might be a ^c:d03e37;blueprint^c:pop; for them in the building store... #line:10003400
It depends on what they're stocking though... #line:10003500

title: Dead Node
body: Oh... it's not just tools either. #line:10001400
Some cooking and crafting stations work the same way. #line:10001500
